td.content: s:a 30 yr old white m tax auditor complains of moderate cough x 5 days. NKDA. o:Height 66 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, wheeze-LU, wheeze-BIL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, crackles-LL a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Theophylline - 100 mg 4xday, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/FVC, Pulse Oximetry, Chest X-Ray.

Value.Value: ordered FEV 1 , FEV 1/FVC , Pulse Oximetry , Chest X - Ray

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate cough, moderate dyspnea and moderate shortness of breath. These symptoms are present for about 2 weeks. he is a male tax auditor aged 31 Ys. o:Height 66 in, Weight 147 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, wheeze-LU, wheeze-BIL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, crackles-LL a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate shortness of breath, moderate cough and moderate dyspnea x 2 days. patient is a 31 yr old white m tax auditor. pt reports that he smokes once or twice daily he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 65 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, wheeze-LU, wheeze-BIL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, crackles-LL a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Bilevel positive airway pressure - Lungs.
